EmailTemplate.name: PREPARE Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You're registered!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You're registered! {!CampaignMember.FirstName}, you have successfully registered for {!CampaignMember.Training_Name__c} with the 501 Commons. Details are below! When: {!CampaignMember.Training_Start_DateTime__c} - {!CampaignMember.Training_End_DateTime__c} Where: {!CampaignMember.C501_Training_Location_Text__c} Food Provided: {!CampaignMember.Meal_Provided__c} Please let us know if you won't be able to make it so we can let another provider take the class. Call us at 206-682-6704 or email prepareforcare@501commons.org. See you soon! -The 501 Commons www.501commons.org ¡Está registrado! {!CampaignMember.FirstName}, está registrado para {!CampaignMember.Training_Name__c} con el Instituto Imagine. Cuando: {!CampaignMember.Training_Start_DateTime__c} - {!CampaignMember.Training_End_DateTime__c} Dirección: {!CampaignMember.C501_Training_Location_Text__c} Comida provista: {!CampaignMember.Meal_Provided__c} Si no puede asistir, favor de avisarnos tan pronto como posible. ¿Preguntas? Contáctenos al 206-682-6704 o prepareforcare@501commons.org. -The 501 Commons www.501commons.org
{!$Setup.Imagine_Settings__c.Email_SMS_Unsub_Text__c}
